qa_pair.question: Search for hotels in Paris, France for 2 adults checking in on 2025-02-14 (Valentine's Day) and checking out on 2025-02-16. Request 5 results in JSON format. Among these results, which hotel has the highest overall rating score? Return only the exact hotel name as it appears in the results.

Search for hotels in Tokyo, Japan for 1 adult from 2025-03-01 to 2025-03-05 (4 nights). Request 5 results in USD currency. What is the total price in USD for the cheapest hotel option? Return only the numeric value without the currency symbol.

Search for family-friendly accommodations in Barcelona, Spain for 2 adults and 2 children (ages 8 and 10) from 2025-04-10 to 2025-04-13. Request 5 results. Which hotel has the most guest reviews? Return only the exact hotel name.
Search for hotels in London, UK for 2 adults from 2025-05-20 to 2025-05-23. Request 3 results. Looking at the first hotel in the results, how many total facilities are listed? Return only the number.

Search for hotels in Dubai, UAE for 4 adults needing 2 rooms from 2025-06-15 to 2025-06-18. Request 5 results in USD. What is the price per night (in USD) for the most expensive option? Return only the numeric value.

Search for hotels in New York City, USA for 2 adults from 2025-07-04 to 2025-07-07 (July 4th weekend). Request 5 results. What is the total number of reviews across all 5 hotels combined? Return only the sum as a number.

Search for accommodations in Rome, Italy for 2 adults from 2025-08-10 to 2025-08-14. Request 5 results. How many of the returned results are classified as "Hotel" (versus other accommodation types like Apartment, B&B, etc.)? Return only the count.

Search for hotels in Singapore for 2 adults from 2025-09-01 to 2025-09-04. Request 3 results in EUR currency. What is the total price in EUR for the second hotel in the results? Return only the numeric value.

Search for hotels in Bangkok, Thailand for 1 adult (solo traveler) from 2025-10-15 to 2025-10-20 (5 nights). Request 5 results in USD. Among the results, what is the average price per night across all hotels? Calculate the average and return only the numeric value rounded to 2 decimal places.

Search for hotels in Amsterdam, Netherlands for 2 adults from 2025-11-01 to 2025-11-03. Request 3 results. What is the earliest check-in time available among all the hotels returned? Return the time in HH:MM format (24-hour).
